remarks: The power class of the union of two classes is a subset of the union of their power classes, iff one class is a subclass of the other.  Exercise 4.12(l) of [Mendelson] p. 235.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2003.)
statement: pwssun $p |- ( ( A C_ B \/ B C_ A ) <-> ~P ( A u. B ) C_ ( ~P A u. ~P B ) ) $.
